### Solicitation Description
The Centre of Expertise in Agile and Innovative Procurement (CoEAIP) at Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking a Learning Designer (LD) to support the development of the Agile Procurement Learning Initiative (APLI). The LD will provide expert advice on and improve learning by developing training modules, integrating creative elements, and supporting the Agile Procurement Learning Initiative.

This solicitation is part of the Shared Services Canada Scale Up initiative, a social procurement program aimed at increasing the diversity of bidders on government contracts. The initiative is led by Shared Services Canada and TECHNATION.

A bilingual webinar on May 12, 2023, from 3:00 PM to 4:00 PM EST will provide details on the requirement and the automated bidding solution.

### Submission Requirements
To submit a response to the solicitation, suppliers must:

1. Download the ScaleUp Standard Instructions document and review it.
2. Participate in the webinar (optional but recommended).
3. Contact the Contracting Authority for a Supplier Unique Identifier (SUI).
4. Access the Automated Bidding Solution using the SUI provided.
5. Submit their response electronically, including the bid solicitation portion and financial bid portion.

### Contact Information
For any questions or concerns, please contact:
James F. Morgan
Contracting Authority
Phone: (604) 715-7515
Email: [James.Morgan@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:James.Morgan@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
